rooms.description: A spacious and airy entrance hall designed to welcome guests. It follows Kerala traditional aesthetics with wooden beams and tiled floors.
A central living area that connects to the garden and courtyard. Features natural ventilation with large windows.
A spacious dining area integrated with the living room, featuring traditional Kerala style decor.
A fully equipped kitchen designed with modern amenities but styled to reflect traditional Kerala aesthetics.
A serene and private master bedroom with a walk-in closet, located towards the north for positive energy.
Three additional bedrooms arranged symmetrically for privacy and comfort, each furnished with standard amenities.
A dedicated library space for reading and study, featuring built-in shelves and ambient lighting.

openings.description: Main entrance door designed with traditional Kerala motifs.
Large windows to allow natural light and ventilation, ensuring Vastu compliance.
Seamless transition from indoor to outdoor living space.

special_features.description: A modern swimming pool integrated within the landscaped garden area, offering relaxation and leisure.
An open courtyard that acts as a natural light well and ventilation space following Vastu principles.
